hanzi-su-wiki:
癒

Значения

Лечить; утолять (жажду); выздоравливать, исцеляться

Мнемоника

Радость 愉 избавления от болезни 疒, исцеление.

Варианты

愈, 瘉
purpleculture_pinyin:
yù
get well, recover
выздоравливай, поправляйся
rtega_mnemonic:
癒癒RS瘉get well, recover
  • sick 疒 getting better (approval from the heart) 愈
purpleculture_info: Ideographic: To recover 愈 from an illness 疒; 愈 also provides the pronunciation
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿸ Surround from upper left
    • 疒 [ nè ] sickness, disease
    • 愈 [ yù ] to recover, to heal; more and more
heisig_chinese_memo: At the butcher's meeting, all the butcher's who have a heart disease attend the faith healing workshop to try to get well.
heisig_constituent: healing, sickness, hospital, in the nick of time, meeting of butchers, moon, month, flesh, part of the body, sword, sabre, saber, heart
koohiiStory1: (Think rpg!) We were in dire need of healing. Our party was fighting the cavemen, but we didn't fare too well. It was more like a butcher's meeting than a fight... just as they were about to pierce my heart, luckily a priest came along and used his healing spell in the nick of time (#2433).
koohiiStory2: Note: meeting of butchers + heart are later combined into 愈 in the nick of time (#2433). Story: For healing to take place, you must catch the sickness in the nick of time.
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: The sick Death Star needs its heart cured. If it doesn't get healing soon, it will die.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Maybe the Death Star wouldn't be sick if it wasn't so mean to you, yelling at you for living in a yurt, when it was a yurt on the inside the whole time. Wait! I know the cure!
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: You realized that the only way to cure the Death Star is to turn it back into a yurt (ゆ). Then it won't be able to do any more harm, and its outside will reflect its pleasant self on the inside!
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Hmm, but does this type of yurt healing technology exist?! You'll have to find out to cure it!!
Ru_Notes: Радикал "болезнь" (疒): кандзи, содержащие компонент 疒, почти все связаны с болезнями.
Ru_Radicals: 个 (китайский счётный суффикс), 刈 (косить), 心 (сердце), 月 (месяц), 疔 (фурункул)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: in general (俞), an ill (疒) heart (心) should be cured
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: At the butcher's meeting, all the butcher's who have a heart disease attend the faith healing workshop to try to get well.

癒字的基本解释

癒
yù
同“愈”③。

癒字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yù］
［《集韻》勇主切，上噳，以。］
痊愈。

癒字的康熙字典解释

【午集中】【疒字部】　癒； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页781第16
【集韻】【韻會】?勇主切，音禹。病瘳也。與瘉同。

yù
вм. 愈 (выздороветь)
Radicals: 疒, 心  (sick, heart, death-star)
Meaning Mnemonic
The sick Death Star needs its heart cured. If it doesn't get healing soon, it will die.
Maybe the Death Star wouldn't be sick if it wasn't so mean to you, yelling at you for living in a yurt, when it was a yurt on the inside the whole time. Wait! I know the cure!
Reading Mnemonic
You realized that the only way to cure the Death Star is to turn it back into a yurt (ゆ). Then it won't be able to do any more harm, and its outside will reflect its pleasant self on the inside!
Hmm, but does this type of yurt healing technology exist?! You'll have to find out to cure it!!
